user_query: I want to stay updated on the prices of major commodities. Fetch the last traded price, highest price, lowest price, price change, change percentage, and time of the latest update. Additionally, provide me with the technical data for global indices on an hourly, daily, weekly, and monthly basis.

TaskList.description: Fetch the last traded price, highest price, lowest price, price change, change percentage, and time of the latest update for major commodities.
Fetch hourly technical data for global indices.
Fetch daily technical data for global indices.
Fetch weekly technical data for global indices.
Fetch monthly technical data for global indices.
